alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Clay; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Randolph, northern Tallapoosa, northwestern Chambers and southeastern Clay Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Site, or 9 miles northeast of Alexander City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Roanoke, Lineville, Ashland, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Wadley, Goldville, Malone, Abanda, Trammel Crossroads, Ridge Grove, Hillabee Creek, Crystal Lake, Penton, Sparkling Springs, Northern Lake Martin, Daviston, Cleveland Crossroads and Dickert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Alabama.
